definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品販子擔心傳統音樂會的狀況。

sentences.english: Several rum runners were arrested in the train.
sentences.chinese: 幾個私酒販子在火車上被捕了。

sentences.english: The dealer sells each cat for about 50 yuan (US$7.31) to restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 這些貓販子以每隻貓50元人民幣的價格賣給餐館。

sentences.english: The wine-sellers elbow their way through the crowd with great black skins on their shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 酒販子肩上扛着黑色大皮簍在人羣裏推搡着前進。

sentences.english: The pedlars were sitting there minding their own business.
sentences.chinese: 小販子在忙自己的生意。

sentences.english: On Thursday, the authorities caught one of the fishmongers.
sentences.chinese: 週二，當局逮捕了其中的一個魚販子。

sentences.english: The police are launching a major attack on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方對毒品販子發動了大規模的攻擊。

sentences.english: He bought the ticket at a high price from a (ticket) scalper.
sentences.chinese: 他從一個票販子手裏高價買了張黃牛票。

sentences.english: A lot of these newly rich people are just big bootleggers, you know.
sentences.chinese: 有很多這樣的暴發戶都是大私酒販子，你要知道。

sentences.english: The slavers had killed one of Yarna's children in the attack.
sentences.chinese: 奴隸販子在襲擊中殺害了亞娜的一個孩子。

sentences.english: Obviously, the rabbit vendor by the train station was a very clever chap.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，火車站賣小兔的販子太狡猾了。

sentences.english: When are you going to start harassing the traffickers?
sentences.chinese: 你打算什麼時候去找找那些人販子的麻煩？

sentences.english: He went among the drug dealers in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 他化裝混到毒品販子當中。

sentences.english: The team posed as drug dealers to trap the ringleaders.
sentences.chinese: 該隊隊員裝扮成毒品販子，誘捕罪犯頭目。

sentences.english: The love of war has gone AWOL at National Review.
sentences.chinese: 國家評論上的戰爭販子也已經偃旗息鼓了。

sentences.english: Faithful grand also at the same time follow at sb' heels and go, think uncover kidnaps and sell dealer this.
sentences.chinese: 忠浩亦同時尾隨而去，想揪出這個拐賣販子。
